languages.text: {n}Мужчина поднимает руку, словно прося разрешения сказать.{/n} "Не надо... не стоит мне жить после того, что я учинил. Я, наверное, уже навсегда порченый в уме — даже сейчас, как гляжу на вас, вижу за вашей спиной топи, где Тацит сгинул..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина поднимает руку, словно прося разрешения сказать.{/n} "Не надо... не стоит мне жить после того, что я учинил. Я, наверное, уже навсегда порченый в уме — даже сейчас, как гляжу на вас, вижу за вашей спиной топи, где Тацит сгинул..."

languages.text: {n}The man raises his hand as though requesting permission to speak.{/n} "Don't... I don't deserve to live after what I've done. My mind is probably corrupted for good already — even now, I'm looking at you, and I can see behind you the marsh where Tacitus vanished..."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина поднимает руку, словно прося разрешения сказать.{/n} "Не надо... не стоит мне жить после того, что я учинил. Я, наверное, уже навсегда порченый в уме — даже сейчас, как гляжу на вас, вижу за вашей спиной топи, где Тацит сгинул..."

{n}The man raises his hand as though requesting permission to speak.{/n} "Don't... I don't deserve to live after what I've done. My mind is probably corrupted for good already — even now, I'm looking at you, and I can see behind you the marsh where Tacitus vanished..."

{n}The man raises his hand as though requesting permission to speak.{/n} "Don't... I don't deserve to live after what I've done. My mind is probably corrupted for good already — even now, I'm looking at you, and I can see behind you the marsh where Tacitus vanished..."

{n}The man raises his hand as though requesting permission to speak.{/n} "Don't... I don't deserve to live after what I've done. My mind is probably corrupted for good already — even now, I'm looking at you, and I can see behind you the marsh where Tacitus vanished..."

languages.text: {n}男は喋る許可をもらうかのように手を挙げた。{/n}「いえ…こんなことをした私には、もはや生きる資格はありません。私の精神も完全に腐敗しているでしょう。今でもあなたの後ろにタキタスが姿を消した沼地が見えます…」
languages.original_text: {n}The man raises his hand as though requesting permission to speak.{/n} "Don't... I don't deserve to live after what I've done. My mind is probably corrupted for good already — even now, I'm looking at you, and I can see behind you the marsh where Tacitus vanished..."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は喋る許可をもらうかのように手を挙げた。{/n}「いえ…こんなことをした私には、もはや生きる資格はありません。私の精神も完全に腐敗しているでしょう。今でもあなたの後ろにタキタスが姿を消した沼地が見えます…」

languages.text: {n}他举起一只手，仿佛在请求你让他说话。{/n}“不要这样……我做了这样的事情，我已经不配再活下去了。我的意识可能已经彻底被腐化了——即便是现在，就站在您的面前，我依然能在您身后看到塔西佗消失的那片沼泽……”
languages.original_text: {n}The man raises his hand as though requesting permission to speak.{/n} "Don't... I don't deserve to live after what I've done. My mind is probably corrupted for good already — even now, I'm looking at you, and I can see behind you the marsh where Tacitus vanished..."

traits.locale_text: {n}他举起一只手，仿佛在请求你让他说话。{/n}“不要这样……我做了这样的事情，我已经不配再活下去了。我的意识可能已经彻底被腐化了——即便是现在，就站在您的面前，我依然能在您身后看到塔西佗消失的那片沼泽……”

languages.text: {n}El hombre levanta la mano, como si pidiera permiso para hablar.{/n} «No lo haga... no merezco vivir después de lo que he hecho. Mi mente probablemente esté completamente corrupta, de todos modos. Incluso ahora, cuando miro detrás de usted, veo el pantano donde desapareció Tacitus...».
languages.original_text: {n}The man raises his hand as though requesting permission to speak.{/n} "Don't... I don't deserve to live after what I've done. My mind is probably corrupted for good already — even now, I'm looking at you, and I can see behind you the marsh where Tacitus vanished..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre levanta la mano, como si pidiera permiso para hablar.{/n} «No lo haga... no merezco vivir después de lo que he hecho. Mi mente probablemente esté completamente corrupta, de todos modos. Incluso ahora, cuando miro detrás de usted, veo el pantano donde desapareció Tacitus...».

languages.text: {n}L'homme lève la main, comme pour demander l'autorisation de parler.{/n} « Non... Je ne mérite pas de vivre après ce que j'ai fait. Mon esprit est sans doute déjà bien trop corrompu... Encore maintenant, quand je vous regarde, je vois derrière vous le marécage où Tacitus a disparu... »
languages.original_text: {n}The man raises his hand as though requesting permission to speak.{/n} "Don't... I don't deserve to live after what I've done. My mind is probably corrupted for good already — even now, I'm looking at you, and I can see behind you the marsh where Tacitus vanished..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme lève la main, comme pour demander l'autorisation de parler.{/n} « Non... Je ne mérite pas de vivre après ce que j'ai fait. Mon esprit est sans doute déjà bien trop corrompu... Encore maintenant, quand je vous regarde, je vois derrière vous le marécage où Tacitus a disparu... »

languages.text: {n}Der Mann hebt die Hand, als bitte er um Erlaubnis, zu sprechen.{/n} "Nicht ... Nach dem, was ich getan habe, verdiene ich nicht zu leben. Mein Geist ist wahrscheinlich ohnehin rettungslos verderbt – selbst jetzt sehe ich direkt hinter Euch den Sumpf, in dem Tacitus verschwunden ist ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The man raises his hand as though requesting permission to speak.{/n} "Don't... I don't deserve to live after what I've done. My mind is probably corrupted for good already — even now, I'm looking at you, and I can see behind you the marsh where Tacitus vanished..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann hebt die Hand, als bitte er um Erlaubnis, zu sprechen.{/n} "Nicht ... Nach dem, was ich getan habe, verdiene ich nicht zu leben. Mein Geist ist wahrscheinlich ohnehin rettungslos verderbt – selbst jetzt sehe ich direkt hinter Euch den Sumpf, in dem Tacitus verschwunden ist ..."

languages.text: {n}Adam, konuşmak için izin ister gibi elini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Yapmayın. Yaptıklarımdan sonra yaşamayı hak etmiyorum. Zihnim muhtemelen temelli olarak yozlaştı. Şu an bile hemen arkanızda Tacitus'un yok olduğu çalılığı görebiliyorum"
languages.original_text: {n}The man raises his hand as though requesting permission to speak.{/n} "Don't... I don't deserve to live after what I've done. My mind is probably corrupted for good already — even now, I'm looking at you, and I can see behind you the marsh where Tacitus vanished..."
